scripts.postgresSql-setup: cat ./models/schema/schema-postgresSql.sql | docker exec -i notes-postgres psql -U notesApp -d notesapp
scripts.sqlite3-start: NOTES_MODEL=sqlite3 cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3002 DEBUG=notes:* nodemon ./app.mjs
scripts.sqlite-sequelize-start: NOTES_MODEL=sequelize  SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=config/sequelize-sqlite.yaml cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3002 DEBUG=notes:* nodemon ./app.mjs
scripts.mongodb-start: cross-env NOTES_MODEL=mongodb NODE_ENV=development PORT=3003 DEBUG=notes:* nodemon ./app.mjs
scripts.sequelize-start: cross-env NOTES_MODEL=sequelize SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=config/sequelize-postgres.yaml PORT=3001 NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=notes:* nodemon ./app.mjs
